title: Ride Ready RECYCLED Powermeters from 4iiii give used cranks new life
content:
Earlier this year, 4iiii announced that they wanted to buy your old crank arms. Why? To reduce, reuse, and ReCycle. The company uses its new ReCYCLED program to repurpose gently used Shimano cranks and get its line of powermeters out to even more riders. It gives a nod to the planet in the meantime; reuse [â€¦]

The post Ride Ready RECYCLED Powermeters from 4iiii give used cranks new life appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
